data.system_settings: Win 10 64-bit, x64-based processor, Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-2400 CPU @ 3.10GHz, 8GB RAM
data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 14651, Version Hash: 05273b109bbf775536938c01a1ba710d1c61d86c
data.actual_result: Client crashes (related to desktop bug #12003, the resulting character count is around 36399) About Optional: 2000 is enough to crash my client when trying to edit, but probably not enough to crash all clients. Probably caused by trying to calculate if all the :: are emotes
data.expected_result: Message gets shown in edit mode sent
data.short_description: (Resubmit)A message with 2000 Unicode characters for ☠ will crash upon trying to edit it
data.steps_to_repro: - Type 2000 Unicode characters for ☠  - Send it - Try to edit the resulting converted message - Optional: ctrl+a the result when editing ctrl+c ctrl+v twice
